1/* mpz_ui_pow_ui -- ulong raised to ulong.
2

19
20or both in parallel, as here.

27You should have received copies of the GNU General Public License and the
28GNU Lesser General Public License along with the GNU MP Library. If not,
29see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/. */
30
31#include "gmp.h"
32#include "gmp-impl.h"
33
34
35void
36mpz_ui_pow_ui (mpz_ptr r, unsigned long b, unsigned long e)
37{
38#if GMP_NAIL_BITS != 0
39 if (b > GMP_NUMB_MAX)
40 {
41 mp_limb_t bb[2];
42 bb[0] = b & GMP_NUMB_MASK;
43 bb[1] = b >> GMP_NUMB_BITS;
44 mpz_n_pow_ui (r, bb, (mp_size_t) 2, e);
45 }
46 else
47#endif
48 {
49#ifdef _LONG_LONG_LIMB
50 /* i386 gcc 2.95.3 doesn't recognise blimb can be eliminated when
51 mp_limb_t is an unsigned long, so only use a separate blimb when
52 necessary. */
53 mp_limb_t blimb = b;
54 mpz_n_pow_ui (r, &blimb, (mp_size_t) (b != 0), e);
55#else
56 mpz_n_pow_ui (r, &b, (mp_size_t) (b != 0), e);
57#endif
58 }
59}
60
